Quick Tip: MySQL Concat

Aug 26, 2013

While working on a project, I was looking for a way to join to mysql columns without using php or .net. I came across the concat function. It basically allows you to join together 2 columns as one.

Here is the code:

SELECT CONCAT(firstname, ' ', lastname) As fullname FROM table1 ....

Hope it helps someone.
